about_the_game:
Fire All Weapons is a roguelike tactical deckbuilding space combat game.

Your ship has been lost in space, among strange hostile aliens. Make your way through their space to try to reach home. Gather new technologies, upgrade your deck, survive, and return home in one piece.

Features

  • Deckbuilding: Upgrade your ship and level up your crew to add cards to your deck.
  • Roguelike: Encounter different challenges in each run. Unlock new starting options.
  • Space Combat: Take command of the bridge. Choose your method of attack. Outmaneuver the enemy. Disrupt their systems. Destroy their weapons. Make them discard their cards!
  • Sci fi stuff: Reverse shield polarity! Auxiliary power to weapons! Evasive pattern delta!
